title: Finishing Goat Milking Stanchion Made with Scrap Lumber (for FREE)

tasks.task: Greet and interact with farm staff and visitors
subtasks: Respond to morning greetings and good mornings
Acknowledge the group filling a tote
Express satisfaction with the meat birds growth

tasks.task: Monitor and care for farm animals
subtasks: Check on the meat birds (freedom ranger) status
Identify the meat bird type (freedom ranger)
Verify the health of egg layer groups (red vs. Easter egg layers)
Confirm presence and welfare of the rooster
Report the loss of one turkey and reassure about others' safety
Investigate the unexpected death of a turkey
Assess the status of the goat milk extension project

tasks.task: Oversee food preparation and utilization of farm products
subtasks: Verify the ketchup topping for the meatloaf

tasks.task: Engage in informal conversation with family and staff
subtasks: Answer questions about children's activities and responsibilities
Dismisses confusion about Chrissy and bus driving
Announce daily farm update topic (homesteading guide)
